overview: Fresh Fruit is a trip into one woman's imagination. She creates a world of sensual fantasy that satisfies her desires in the sweetest of ways. Jean is a hostess for a large modern resort hotel in Sicily. The hotel is built within an ancient cave, even so, amongst all this beauty and endless sunshine, Jean is disenchanted by her work and would rather be somewhere else. Her tendency toward day-dreaming allows her to escape the hum-drum of her routine work. She is bored and wishes she could step out of her own life, take a risk and make everything change to live in the grand imagination of more pleasurable places.
title: Fresh Fruit
